collapse

public static java.lang.String collapse(java.lang.String name)
Collapses a name. Mainly intended for use with classnames, where an example might serve best to explain. Imagine you have a class named 'org.hibernate.internal.util.StringHelper'; calling collapse on that classname will result in 'o.h.u.StringHelper'.

参数：
name - The name to collapse.
返回：
The collapsed name.

collapseQualifier

public static java.lang.String collapseQualifier(java.lang.String qualifier,
                                                 boolean includeDots)
Given a qualifier, collapse it.

参数：
qualifier - The qualifier to collapse.
includeDots - Should we include the dots in the collapsed form?
返回：
The collapsed form.

partiallyUnqualify

public static java.lang.String partiallyUnqualify(java.lang.String name,
                                                  java.lang.String qualifierBase)
Partially unqualifies a qualified name. For example, with a base of 'org.hibernate' the name 'org.hibernate.internal.util.StringHelper' would become 'util.StringHelper'.

参数：
name - The (potentially) qualified name.
qualifierBase - The qualifier base.
返回：
The name itself, or the partially unqualified form if it begins with the qualifier base.

collapseQualifierBase

public static java.lang.String collapseQualifierBase(java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String qualifierBase)
Cross between collapse(java.lang.String) and partiallyUnqualify(java.lang.String, java.lang.String). Functions much like collapse(java.lang.String) except that only the qualifierBase is collapsed. For example, with a base of 'org.hibernate' the name 'org.hibernate.internal.util.StringHelper' would become 'o.h.util.StringHelper'.

参数：
name - The (potentially) qualified name.
qualifierBase - The qualifier base.
返回：
The name itself if it does not begin with the qualifierBase, or the properly collapsed form otherwise.

generateAlias

public static java.lang.String generateAlias(java.lang.String description)

generateAlias

public static java.lang.String generateAlias(java.lang.String description,
                                             int unique)
Generate a nice alias for the given class name or collection role name and unique integer. Subclasses of Loader do not have to use aliases of this form.

参数：
description - The base name (usually an entity-name or collection-role)
unique - A uniquing value
返回：
an alias of the form foo1_

generateAliasRoot

private static java.lang.String generateAliasRoot(java.lang.String description)
Generates a root alias by truncating the "root name" defined by the incoming decription and removing/modifying any non-valid alias characters.

参数：
description - The root name from which to generate a root alias.
返回：
The generated root alias.

cleanAlias

private static java.lang.String cleanAlias(java.lang.String alias)
Clean the generated alias by removing any non-alpha characters from the beginning.

参数：
alias - The generated alias to be cleaned.
返回：
The cleaned alias, stripped of any leading non-alpha characters.

unqualifyEntityName

public static java.lang.String unqualifyEntityName(java.lang.String entityName)

toUpperCase

public static java.lang.String toUpperCase(java.lang.String str)

toLowerCase

public static java.lang.String toLowerCase(java.lang.String str)

moveAndToBeginning

public static java.lang.String moveAndToBeginning(java.lang.String filter)

isQuoted

public static boolean isQuoted(java.lang.String name)
Determine if the given string is quoted (wrapped by '`' characters at beginning and end).

参数：
name - The name to check.
返回：
True if the given string starts and ends with '`'; false otherwise.

quote

public static java.lang.String quote(java.lang.String name)
Return a representation of the given name ensuring quoting (wrapped with '`' characters). If already wrapped return name.

参数：
name - The name to quote.
返回：
The quoted version.

unquote

public static java.lang.String unquote(java.lang.String name)
Return the unquoted version of name (stripping the start and end '`' characters if present).

参数：
name - The name to be unquoted.
返回：
The unquoted version.

toArrayElement

public static java.lang.String[] toArrayElement(java.lang.String s)
Takes a String s and returns a new String[1] with s as the only element. If s is null or "", return String[0].

参数：
s -
返回：
String[]
